integer(kind(rocblas_status_success)) function rocblas_izamax_orig (handle, n, x, incx, myResult)

Detailed Description

!

BLAS Level 1 API

 amax finds the first index of the element of maximum magnitude of a vector x.
vector
Parameters
[in]handle[rocblas_handle] handle to the rocblas library context queue.
[in]n[rocblas_int] the number of elements in x.
[in]xdevice pointer storing vector x.
[in]incx[rocblas_int] specifies the increment for the elements of y.
[in,out]resultdevice pointer or host pointer to store the amax index. return is 0.0 if n, incx<=0.
